feed.title: Category: Moero!! Pro Yakyuu (Bases Loaded) | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Moero!! Pro Yakyuu (Bases Loaded) (NES, 1987)
entry.content: I know I don't seem the type, but I really liked sports games on the NES and SNES. In particular, I have very fond memories of baseball games. I got the Japanese version of this game with my Famicom, so I popped it in and played a few innings. It is definitely a very weak and primitive game. I will try the later versions though, because maybe it got tighter and faster.
